pros: they take care of you spiritually
cons: having to move to a different city, which ended up being one of the biggest blessings

pros: Good teammates, fulfilling work, great students
cons: Support raising is challenging and management can sometimes be difficult

review_title: A more fulfilling job doesn't exist
pros: It is a very positive work environment and the actual mission that we are all working toward is so incredibly fulfilling! Every person I work with shares the vision and values. All of our staff, from senior executives down to new hires, work well together to accomplish our mission.  I couldn't imagine working anywhere else.
cons: Not enough people are applying to work here. There is so much we want to accomplish, but not enough people to do all the great things. Honestly, we need more staff.

job_title: Campus Team Member in Ottawa, ON
pros: Teamwork, constant professional development, moral support
cons: long term employment is limited by roles available
